SkinGO: <ID of the game object. Should match the NewGameObjectID of the gameObject in the gameObject folder. Example - skinulfvitr>
SkinID: <ID of the skin. Should match filename. Example - stormshamanbase>
SkinName: <Name of the skin as it appears when selecting skins. Example - Wolf Wars Magnus>
SkinSubclass: <subclass associated with the skin. Example - stormshaman>
SpritePortrait: <Sprite for the in combat portrait. AndrinPortrait>
SpritePortraitGrande: <Sprite for the map portrait. Example - AndrinPortraitGrande>
SpriteSilueta: <Sprite for the hero selection portrait. Example - AndrinSilueta>
SpriteSiluetaGrande: <Sprite for the in combat reward portrait. Example - AndrinSiluetaGrande>
